forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers late. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
